goalText: Go to the break room on Level 2 and check in with your partner, Agent Anna Navarre.
Go to the break room on Level 2 and check in with your partner, Agent Anna Navarre.
Report to headquarters on the west side of the island for a debriefing.
Report to headquarters for a debriefing.
Report to headquarters on the west side of the island for a debriefing.
See Sam Carter for equipment.
See Sam Carter for equipment.
See Jaime Reyes for a medical exam.
See Jaime Reyes for a medical exam.
Go to Manderley's office on Level 2 for the mission briefing.
Go to Manderley's office on Level 2 for the mission briefing.
Report to Manderley's office on Level 2.
Report to Manderley.
The NSF seem to be directing the attack from the Statue.  Get inside and locate the threat.
One of UNATCO's top agents is being held inside the Statue.  Break him out, and he'll back you up against the NSF.
Meet UNATCO informant Harley Filben at the North Docks.  He has a key to the Statue doors.
Go to the South Dock and take the police boat to Manhattan.
Talk to the locals in the bar or the clinic for clues to the location of the generator.
Find the NSF's secret generator.  Paul's team will raid the warehouse when the generator is destroyed and the EMP field goes down.
Report to Paul in Hell's Kitchen.
Report to Paul in Hell's Kitchen.
label: Done

goalText: Take the subway to Hell's Kitchen and report to Paul.
Report to Paul in Hell's Kitchen.
Free the hostages in the Battery Park subway station, east of Castle Clinton.
Free the hostages in the Battery Park subway station, east of Castle Clinton.
Investigate the hostage situation in the 'Ton Hotel, at the southeast corner of the block.  Rescue the Rentons, if they are still inside.
Report to Agent Navarre to receive your orders.
Rescue Smuggler's friend Ford Schick from a secret laboratory in the sewers.  The sewers are accessed by the grates in the street.
Rescue Smuggler's friend Ford Schick from a secret laboratory in the sewers.  The sewers are accessed by the grates in the street.
A man named Johnny took a woman into an alley west of the Underworld Bar.  Investigate the situation.
Locate the stolen barrel of Ambrosia in Castle Clinton.
Go to the helicopter at the airfield.
Go to the helicopter at the airfield.
Go to the helicopter at the airfield.
Go to the helicopter at the airfield.

Open a fresh water supply for the homeless in Brooklyn Bridge Station.  The valve is in a utility room at the north end of the train tracks that has been blocked by a cave-in.  Clear the cave-in with LAMs, find the valve, turn on the water, and report back to Charlie Fann.  The Rooks might have LAMs.
Talk to Charlie in the Brooklyn Bridge Station for information on the mole people.
Locate the airfield where the NSF has moved the Ambrosia.  Investigate the subway system, because the terrorists may be hiding underground.
Report to Sam Carter to receive your equipment.
Kill the drug dealer in the Brooklyn Bridge Station for the Rooks, then inform El Rey.
Gain access to the 747 hangar and locate the final barrel.
Locate the three missing barrels of Ambrosia.  UNATCO will send a team to recover them.
Assassinate Juan Ivanovich Lebedev.
Tell Jaime that Walton Simons is looking for him.
Meet Jock at the helipad to be taken to a new assignment in Hong Kong.
Escape from UNATCO and go to the helipad.
Investigate the captured NSF base to the west behind the bar to see if Paul is telling the truth about UNATCO.  If he is, help the rebels by sending a distress signal from the satellite transmitter.
Find Jock's helicopter in Battery Park, the only way out of New York not controlled by UNATCO.  The code to the Hell's Kitchen subway station is 6282.
See Manderley for a debriefing.
Meet up with Paul and help him leave New York.
label: GoodAlign

goalText: Your brother's in trouble.  Go to the apartment in Hell's Kitchen and see if he needs your help.
Send the NSF distress signal from the satellite transmitter on the roof of NSFHQ.
Eliminate Anna Navarre.
Eliminate Anna Navarre.
When Anna Navarre is dead, see Alex for a key to the exit.
When Anna Navarre is dead, see Alex for a key to the exit.
See Alex for a key to the exit.
label: Dead

goalText: Find Anna Navarre's killphrase.  It is stored in two pieces on two computers, each with the login "demiurge" in the password "archon".
Escape from the Majestic 12 facility.
label: Hop

goalText: Meet Jock on the roof.  At the west end of the dock is a maintenance store to the air conditioning system.  Use the ladder inside to get into the ventilation channels and up onto the roof.
Find the equipment taken from you when you were captured by UNATCO.
Find your brother and access information in his datavault that Tracer Tong will need to defeat the killswitch.
Get the datavault from your brother's body.  Tracer Tong will need it to defeat the killswitch.
Tell Gordon Quick how the Red Arrow responded to the news about Maggie Chow.  He should be near the Luminous Path compound next to the Wan Chai market.
After convincing Max Chen of Maggie Chow's deceit, return to Gordon Quick and tell him how the Red Arrow responded to the news.
Find evidence in the police station in the Wan Chai Market that will settle the Triad dispute.  Bring it to Maggie Chow to earn her trust.
Visit Maggie Chow, at 1313 Tonnochi Road.
Take the Dragon Tooth's sword to the temple in Wan Chai to cement the alliance between the Triads.
Go to the temple in Wan Chai to cement the alliance between the Triads.
Gain access to the Level 2 labs at VersaLife and locate information on the structure of the plague virus.
Board Jock's helicopter in the Luminous Path compound.
Go to the center of the Operating Theater so that Tracer Tong can deactivate the killswitch and restore augmentation functionality.
Get the ROM-encoding for the Dragon's Tooth sword from the basement laboratories at VersaLife.
Report to Tracer Tong for information on Stanton Dowd and the Illuminati.
Retrieve the Dragon's Tooth sword and await further instructions from Tracer Tong.
Demonstrate Maggie Chow's guilt to the Red Arrow by showing Max Chen the Dragon's Tooth sword.  Find Max Chen in the Lucky Money Club in the mall near Wan Chai Market.
Reveal Maggie Chow's guilt to the Red Arrow.  Find Max Chen in the Lucky Money Club in the mall near Wan Chai Market.
Find Tracer Tong somewhere in Hong Kong.
Find Tracer Tong.
Look for clues to finding Tracer Tong at the compound that Paul used to visit, to the east of the Wan Chai market.
Deactivate the weapon-lock on Jock's helicopter.  The remote control-panel is on Flight Control Deck One.
Escape the VersaLife facility through the floor of the Universal Constructor chamber.
Destroy the Universal Constructor used for manufacturing plague virus.
Report to Tracer Tong inside the Luminous Path compound to deliver the good news of the truce.
Meet the dragon heads at the Lucky Money for drinks.
Find and examine the Dragon's Tooth sword as proof regarding whether or not Maggie Chow is telling the truth.
Meet Stanton Dowd at the Osgood & Son's storefront, near the tunnels leading to the warehouse district.
Kill the traitor, Joe Greene in the Free Clinic
Bring Stanton Dowd some Ambrosia to counteract the Gray Death.
See the Smuggler for explosives for scuttling the superfreighter.
See the Smuggler for explosives for scuttling the superfreighter.
label: Primary

goalText: Scuttle the PCS Wall Cloud by destroying the 5 tri-hull welds with explosives and by reversing the bilge-pump flow.  Pumping water into the bilges will destabilize the ship's weight distribution and cause the hull to split open.
label: Scuttle

goalText: Once you obtain items from Smuggler, get back to the hotel roof and take the helicopter to Brooklyn Naval Shipyard.
Get to the Underworld Tavern and meet with Harley Filben.
Cut the power to the transformers that are shorting out and electrifying the overhead walkway.  Two control panels must be shut down, one of them under the floor.
Take the helicopter to Paris.  Make contact with Silhouette in the Paris catacombs.
Find Silhouette's hideout in the catacombs and talk to their leader.
Get onto ship
Get onto Ship
Get onto ship
Find a way to the lower decks.
Disable the EM disruption field that is preventing Jock from landing.  The source seems to be a small building just inside the cemetery gate.
Enter Main building on north side of Dockyard. There may be more than one entry point.
Find Ammo Storage warehouse and raid ammo bunkers for more LAMs or Rockets.
Meet Stanton Dowd at his family crypt inside the graveyard.
Kill the four greasels in the sewers, then inform the frightened woman who lives in the apartment ruins.
Find Nicolette DuClare.  She is known to frequent Club La Porte de l'Enfer.
Find Nicolette DuClare.  She is known to frequent Club La Porte de l'Enfer.
Free the members of Silhouette being held in Bunker 03.
Protect the hostages as they try to make it back to Silhouette's bunker.
After the rescue attempt, inform Chad of the hostages' fate.
Kill the three MJ12 soldiers in the metro station next to the underground mall.  Report back to Defoe.
Meet Nicolette behind Club La Porte de l'Enfer.
Go to the family crypt in the maze behind the chateau and await instructions from Morgan Everett.
Find Beth DuClare's secret computer room, which should contain clues to the whereabouts of Morgan Everett.
Search the DuClare chateau for evidence of Morgan Everett's relationship with Beth DuClare.
Get the zyme from the bakery and sell it to Renault.
Make contact with the Illuminati in Paris, where the former Illuminati leader, Morgan Everett, is rumored to be in hiding.
Meet Jaime at a cafe in building 19.
Access the Templar computer system so that Morgan Everett can complete work on a cure for the Gray Death.
Find Nicolette and get the key to the family crypt.
Meet Jock at the helipad.  Leave for Vandenberg Airforce Base.
label: Go

goalText: Meet Jock at the helipad.  Leave for Vandenberg Airforce Base.
Meet Jock outside the silo.
Tell Everett that Lucius DeBeers is cold.
Tell Lucius that Everett does not intend to revive him?
Kill the phony mechanic who infiltrated Everett's estate.
Go to the metro station and await further instructions.
Meet Toby Atanwe, Everett's associate, in the metro station.
Recover the gold from the Templars' cathedral, now occupied by MJ12.
Destroy the 2 MJ12 military bots and 2 MJ12 security bots.  Base will remain under lockdown until the bots are destroyed.
Destroy the 2 MJ12 military bots and 2 MJ12 security bots.  Base will remain under lockdown until the bots are destroyed.
Activate backup power for the X-51 scientists' bot security system.
Activate backup power for the X-51 scientists' bot security system.
Bring up the Vandenberg computer system, needed to operate the UC and to allow Everett to defend Daedalus.
Rescue Gary Savage's daughter, Tiffany, from the gas station where Majestic 12 is holding her.
From the recently damaged MJ12 Ocean Lab, recover the schematic Gary Savage needs to complete a Universal Constructor.
Return to the helicopter in the junkyard.
Return to the helicopter.
Return to the helicopter in the junkyard.
Find Gary Savage, believed to be in the control room.
Uplink Daedalus to the military computers near the control room on the second floor of the command building.
Meet Jock at the front entrance to Vandenberg, northeast of the base.
Go to the control room to receive a communication from Bob Page.
Go to the communications center to gain access to Gary Savage.
Steal a mini-sub from the URV module submerged just offshore, then take it to the ocean lab.
Go to the launch tube and make sure MJ12 does not sabotage the missile launch.
Reprogram the missile to strike Area 51.
Abort the launch of the nuclear missile.
Meet Gary Savage and Jock on top of the sub base's command module, just onshore.

(Merge with Helios AI)  Deactivate the uplink locks on the Aquinas Router at the east end of Sector 4, thus allowing Helios to exchange information with your augmentations.  Together with Helios, administrate the world with absolute knowledge and reason.

(Join Illuminati)  Kill Bob Page and clear the way for the former Illuminati leaders to restore an age-old secret government.  Rule the world with compassion and an invisible hand alongside Morgan Everett.

(Join Illuminati)  Kill Bob Page and clear the way for the former Illuminati leaders to restore an age-old secret government.  Rule the world with compassion and an invisible hand alongside Morgan Everett.

(New Dark Age)  First go to the coolant control room at the northwest corner of Sector 4 and cut off coolant to the reactors, then return to the reactor lab in Sector 3 to finish the job.  Destroying the global communications hub will plunge the world into another dark age -- dark but perhaps free from global tyranny.
Bring up the power to the elevator system in order to access Page's bunker below.
(Merge with Helios AI)  Return to the Sector 3 Aquinas Hub to merge with Helios and rule earth with benevolence, wisdom, and absolute power.
(Join Illuminati) Bring down the four blue-fusion reactors in Page's bunker then go to the infusion control room on the upper level to cut all power to his defense systems.
Talk to Helios at the Aquinas Hub to gain access to Sector 4.
Gain Sector 2 access by talking to Morgan Everett at the Station 5 holographic communicator.
Get past the blast doors north of the helipad.
Get access to the Area 51 Bunker.
(New Dark Age)  Return to the reactor lab in Sector 3 to initiate a meltdown and destroy Area 51's global communications hub.
Go to the reactor control room.  Activate the three ion injectors, then initiate the antimatter-matter reaction.  Run.
